Anja brenka pa tudi meh raztegne
Na odru med nastopi na brhko mladenko pazi fant David Šalamun. Oba sta, skupaj z Urbanom Lenartom, člana Ansambla Refren.
01 Nov 2019, 17:11 by M. M.



Anja Zorjan je vsestranska glasbenica.



Glasbeno pot je začela s harmoniko, danes igra pet inštrumentov.



Ansambel Refren



Med snemanjem videospota so jo ujeli pri preoblačenju.


Peto leto je že na glasbeni sceni Ansambel Refren. Gre za trio zasedbo dveh fantov, Davida Šalamuna in Urbana Lenarta, ki imata ob sebi še dekle Anjo Zorjan, vsi pa prihajajo iz Štajerske. Prav Anja je nekaj posebnega, saj je njihova umetniška vodja pa tudi pevka, ki igra več inštrumentov.


Ansambel Refren

V triu je kitaristka, a če je treba, zatrobi v bariton, zabrenka na kontrabas ali pa raztegne meh bodisi diatonične bodisi klavirske harmonike.A ni le vsestranska multiinštrumentalistka, Anja je tudi tista, ki obvlada višje tone. Čeprav je še mlado dekle, ima za seboj dvanajst let glasbene kilometrine, na odre pa je najprej stopila prav s harmoniko, s katero je osvajala nagrade in priznanja na raznih tekmovanjih. Pravzaprav je postala mojstrica, harmonika pa ostaja njena največja ljubezen še danes, čeprav zdaj v ansamblu najpogosteje brenka, meh pa je prepustila svojemu fantu Davidu Šalamunu.


Glasbeno pot je začela s harmoniko, danes igra pet inštrumentov.

Ker je povrhu vsega še zelo simpatična, je prav ona pravi magnet za poglede številnih ljubiteljev glasbe, ki so kar malo razočarani, ko izvedo, da je že oddana in da njen fant stoji na nastopih tik ob njej ter vsaj z enim očesom budno pazi nanjo. Najnovejši videospot so posneli v Biotermah Mala Nedelja in glampingu, kjer so jim družbo delali igralci, njuni prijatelji Matjaž Golob, Anja Mikša, Nataša Kos in Žan Ploj. Da je bilo vse, kot mora biti, so skrbeli še številni, ki so jim refrenovci hvaležni za ves angažma.

On stage during appearances on the brash bride, boy David David Salamun is watching. The two, along with Urban Lenart, are members of the Refren Ensemble.
01 Nov 2019, 16:11 by M.M.



Anja Zorjan is a versatile musician.



She began her musical career with the accordion, today she plays five instruments.



Ensemble Refren



She was caught in the altercation while recording the video.


The fifth year is already on the music scene of the Ensemble Refren. It is a trio of two guys, David Salamun and Urban Lenart, who have a girlfriend Anja Zorjan and they all come from Styria. Anja is something special, because their artistic director is also a singer who plays several instruments.


Ensemble Refren

The trio has a guitar player, but if necessary, trumpets, double-bass or stretches the bellows of either a diatonic or piano accordion. And not only is she a versatile multi-instrumentalist, Anja is also the master of the higher tones. Although she is a young girl, she has twelve years of musical mileage, and she first stepped on the stage with an accordion to win awards and accolades at various competitions. In fact, she became a master, and the accordion remains her greatest love to this day, though she is most often the ensemble in the ensemble, leaving the bellows to her boyfriend David Shalamun.


She began her musical career with the accordion, today she plays five instruments.

On top of all that she is very nice, she is a real magnet for the eyes of many music lovers, who are a little disappointed when she learns that she has already been cast and that her boyfriend is standing next to her and with one eye on her . The latest video was filmed at Bioterms Mala Nedelja and glamping, where they were played by actors, their friends Matjaz Golob, Anja Miksa, Natasa Kos and Jean Ploy. That everything was as it should be was taken care of by many, to whom the refrainers are grateful for all the engagement.
